alert.note: Alert for Barber; Comanche (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 1:52AM CDT until July 21 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Barber County in south central Kansas... Comanche County in south central Kansas... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 152 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wilmore to 8 miles southeast of Coldwater to near Buttermilk to 8 miles northeast of Selman, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Coldwater, Lake City, Wilmore, Aetna, Lake Coldwater and Buttermilk. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
